SEARCH
Package acsse.csc2a.nova.util

Class DrawUtils.RenderInfo

java.lang.Object
acsse.csc2a.nova.util.DrawUtils.RenderInfo
Enclosing class:
DrawUtils
public static final class DrawUtils.RenderInfo extends Object
Immutable container returned by DrawUtils.locateBody(CelestialBody, GraphicsContext). Every field is already expressed in pixels so drawing code never has to repeat centre ± radius arithmetic.
